n: Look at the faces of all these devastated folks. Even the kids look like their favorite dog just got run over by an eighteen wheeler. I guess I'd be sad too if I was pulling down 650K a year.
d: How Much Will Your Taxes Jump in 2013?

n: Couldn't find a good source for this (it's originally from one of his books, I believe), so the image will have to suffice.
d: Stephen Hawking: What Happened Before the Big Bang?

n: Here are the other prevailing hypotheses from scientist who believe that the whole "time didn't exist before the big bang" thing is a cop out.
d: What Happened Before The Big Bang?
